intro: Coldenia elongata, commonly known as the longleaf coldenia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, elongated leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Coldenia elongata is often used in traditional medicine for its purported therapeutic properties.
